potions.name: Invisibility Potion
potions.description: Makes the drinker invisible for a limited time.

potions.name: Strength Potion
potions.description: Enhances the drinker's physical strength temporarily.

potions.name: Love Potion
potions.description: Creates feelings of affection and attraction.

potions.name: Firebreath Potion
potions.description: Allows the drinker to breathe fire momentarily.

potions.name: Flying Potion
potions.description: Grants the ability to fly for a limited time.

potions.name: Sleeping Potion
potions.description: Induces a deep sleep in the drinker.

potions.name: Growth Potion
potions.description: Causes the drinker to grow in size temporarily.

potions.name: Invisibility Detection Potion
potions.description: Reveals invisible entities in the vicinity.
